title: Chocolate deposit

properties.name: description
properties.value: Chocolate deposits are a rock present during the 2018 Easter event. They can be mined at any Mining level.

content:
Chocolate deposit was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
Chocolate deposit
Released29 March 2018 (Update)
MembersNo
QuestNo
LocationVaries
ExamineA wall of chocolate!
Advanced data
Object IDRemoved

Chocolate deposits are a rock present during the 2018 Easter event. They can be mined at any Mining level.

When successfully mined by a player, they receive chocolate chunks, which yields no Mining experience. Unlike most other rocks, chocolate deposits never run out of resources.

Mining Info[edit | edit source]
